ValidationRule.description: Valid entry values for IAAP Registered SBS based on IAAP Registered BUR
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR ( AND ( RecordType.Name = 'Contractor', ISPICKVAL (IAAP_Registered_BUR__c, 'IAAP Diamond Registered'), ISPICKVAL ( IAP_Registered_SBS__c, 'IAAP Registered')), AND ( RecordType.Name = 'Contractor', ISPICKVAL (IAAP_Registered_BUR__c, 'IAAP Registered'), ISPICKVAL ( IAP_Registered_SBS__c, 'IAAP Diamond Registered')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If IAAP Diamond Registered value is selected for IAAP Reg. BUR, then IAAP Reg. SBS MUST have IAAP Diamond Registered or No as Values. If IAAP Registered is selected for IAAP Reg. BUR, then IAAP Reg. SBS MUST have IAAP Registered or No as values.
